name: Camaraderie
ability: Each time an opposing Creature deals Damage to your team, deal 1 Damage to the opposing Team.

name: Coordination
ability: While you or your Teammate control a Creature on a Landscape with a Frozen token on it, your Team may play Creatures onto Landscapes with Frozen tokens on them.

name: Assistance
ability: At the start of your or your Teammate's Fight Phase, if you or your Teammate played a Creature with cost 2 or greater this turn, the other Teammate may draw a card.

name: Fellowship
ability: During your turn and your Teammate's Fight Phase, the first time Damage is dealt to an opponent, the other Teammate may deal 1 Damage to target Creature in 1 of their Lanes.

name: Solidarity
ability: The first Creature that attacks another Creature during your Team's turns has +1 ATK that turn.

name: Synchronization
ability: At the start of your or your Teammate's Fight Phase, if you or your Teammate played no Spells this turn, the other Teammate may play a Spell with cost 1 or less without paying its cost.

name: Cooperation
ability: At the start of your or your Teammate's Fight Phase, if you or your Teammate played no Creatures this turn, the other Teammate may play a Creature with cost 1 or less without paying its cost.

name: Contribution
ability: At the start of your or your Teammate's Fight Phase, if you or your Teammate drew 3 or more cards this turn, the other Teammate may draw a card.

name: Collaboration
ability: The first time you or your Teammate play a Rainbow Spell during their turn, the other Teammate may play a Rainbow Spell with the same cost without paying its cost.

name: Communication
ability: The first time you or your Teammate play a Rainbow Spell with cost 0 during their turn, the other Teammate may copy it and may choose new targets.
